resources.string: 5 days for free. After the end of the free version the price is free per month. Canceled at any time.

This subscription disables all types of advertising in our entertainment application, and also gives priority service by email if you write to us by mail. After the trial ends, you will be billed $3.99 for a 1-month subscription, which will be automatically renewed for $3.99 each month. By signing up, you agree to our terms and conditions and privacy policy. How to cancel a subscription, you can find out in the Menu - Information.
